welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dugny, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer. Bon voyage!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Le Bourget Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Comprised of seven sub-terminals, Terminal 2 serves mainly international and long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Orly Airport, used mostly for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a time limit of 4 hours per day.
